result.markdown:
--- title: "Week 5 Exercises: Assumptions, Diagnostics, Writing up" params: SHOW_SOLS: TRUE TOGGLE: TRUE editor_options: chunk_output_type: console ---
Question 1
conduct an analysis to address the research aims!

Question 2
check the assumptions of your model

Question 3
check the extent to which your results may be sensitive to certain influential Xs or XXs.

Question 4
Write a short description of the sample data.

Question 5
Write a short explanation of your methods ::: {.callout-tip collapse="true"} #### Hints - explain transformations to the data prior to modelling - explain the model(s) fitted and how they address the research aims - describe any actions taken as a result of non-convergence - what estimation method was used (ML, REML)? What software (including version and packages)? What optimiser? - if degrees of freedom were used, what kind? If not, how are inferences conducted? - what assumptions of the model were checked, and what was the outcome? :::

Question 6
write a short summary of your results, along with suitable visualisations and tables ::: {.callout-tip collapse="true"} #### Hints - if model comparisons were conducted, provide results and what they mean - present and interpret fixed effects estimates that are relevant to the research aim. - discuss random effect estimates - does the relevant effect vary a lot between clusters? - was the sensitivty of the results to influential observations/clusters assessed? if so, what did you find? :::
